title: Xavier Moore: The Time-Twisting Mentor
summary: Xavier Moore, a 76-year-old with the power to manipulate time, spends a week mentoring young superheroes and ends it by thwarting a major city threat.
summaryGerman: Xavier Moore, ein 76-jähriger mit der Fähigkeit, die Zeit zu manipulieren, verbringt eine Woche damit, junge Superhelden zu betreuen und beendet sie, indem er eine große Bedrohung für die Stadt vereitelt.
summaryDutch: Xavier Moore, een 76-jarige met de macht om tijd te manipuleren, brengt een week door met het begeleiden van jonge superhelden en eindigt deze door een grote stadsdreiging te dwarsbomen.
summaryFrench: Xavier Moore, âgé de 76 ans et capable de manipuler le temps, passe une semaine à encadrer de jeunes superhéros et la termine en déjouant une grande menace urbaine.

story.text: Xavier begins his week in his peaceful garden, reflecting on his many adventures. He receives a visit from a young superhero seeking guidance on handling time-related powers.
He meets with the young hero at a local cafe, sharing techniques on controlling temporal fluxes. Their discussion is interrupted by a sudden eerie silence falling over the city.
Xavier uses his time manipulation abilities to discern that the silence is caused by a temporal anomaly in the city center. He prepares to investigate.
With his protégé alongside, Xavier confronts the source of the anomaly: a time-displaced villain seeking to alter history. An epic battle ensues.
After triumphing over the villain, Xavier repairs the temporal damage, restoring the city’s rhythm. He spends the evening mentoring more young heroes about the responsibilities of power.
Xavier visits a superhero conference, giving a keynote about the ethics of time manipulation. His speech is met with enthusiastic applause, leaving him feeling happy and fulfilled.
Back home, Xavier reflects on his week, pleased with the progress his protégés have made. He ends his day with a walk through his garden, feeling at peace once again.

moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and the wisdom to guide the next generation is the true mark of a hero.
ending: As the sun set on Sunday, Xavier Moore smiled, knowing the city was safer and the future brighter, thanks to his efforts and those he's guided.
